detail_desc: Playsuit in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Short, sleeveless dress in soft viscose jersey with a sheen. Opening with ties at the front, gathers at the shoulders, an elasticated seam at the waist and a straight skirt with a rounded hem.

Short, cold shoulder dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and flounces that go over the arms held in place by narrow elastication. Sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the neckline. Seam at the waist with narrow elastication at the back, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Windbreaker in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a round neckline with narrow ribbing.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Hat in a sturdy, rib-knit cotton blend with a wide turned-up hem.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Large scarf in an airy, patterned Tencel™ lyocell and mulberry silk blend. Size 140x140 cm.

Jumpsuit in an airy viscose and linen weave with a deep V-neck and buttons down the front. Short sleeves with turn-ups, a detachable tie belt at the waist and wide, ankle-length legs with patch pockets at the sides.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-style top in smocked jersey with wide shoulder straps and a flounce at the hem.
Pull-on trousers in an airy linen and viscose blend with elastication and low ribbing at the waist. Side pockets, fake back pockets and gently tapered legs.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in imitation leather with fringing around the yoke and down the sleeves. Collar, dropped shoulders and discreet side pockets. Press-studs down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Vest top in soft, ribbed jersey with a flounce around the neckline that continues over the shoulders.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Fitted vest top in microfibre. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Lined bandeau bikini top with padded cups and a metal fastener at the back. Silicone trim at the top, side support and visible seams and gathers for a pleated effect.

Fleece-lined rain jacket in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood that is elasticated at the sides. Zip down the front with a chin guard, elastication at the cuffs and reflective details. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a detachable belt. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with a round neck, dropped shoulders, long, tapered sleeves and a straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs. Push up shaping – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some alpaca wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short vest top in a crinkled viscose weave with a lace detail. V-neck with a wrapover front and an elasticated hem.

Set with a pair of mittens and a hat with earflaps in a fine knit. Hat with a pompom on top, ties under the chin and a fleece lining. Mittens with foldover ribbing at the top. Size 0-2M and 2-6M without thumbs.
Loose-fitting T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose and linen blend. V-neck, low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits at the hem.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Knee-length skirt in woven fabric with fringes. Concealed zip in one side. Unlined.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and long sleeves. Zip down the front that continues down one leg and foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with an extra-high waist and zip fly and button. Loose fit with gently tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Slip-on trainers in velvet with a padded top edge and elastic gores in the sides. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and patterned soles.
Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a stand-up collar, smocked yoke and long, wide sleeves with smocked cuffs. Seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Base layer set with a top and pair of tights in soft, fast-drying functional fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for optimal comfort. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Tights with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Loafers with leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Jumpsuit in patterned cotton jersey with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.2 cm.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with creases, a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with a high waist, pleats at the top, zip fly, discreet pockets in the side seams and ankle-length, tapered legs with creases.
Long-sleeved shirt in cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, textured organic cotton knit with a round neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short dress in pattern-weave fabric with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar that ties at the back of the neck and a V-neck at the back with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Short, A-line dress in a viscose weave with a deep V-neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, narrow elastication at the cuffs, and gathered, asymmetric seams for added width. Unlined.
Top in a textured weave with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Fitted at the top with a seam under the bust and wide flare to the hem. Lined.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. Gathered seams at the waist and hem for added width. Lined at the top of the front.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Fully lined jacket in woven fabric with a hood, stand-up collar with a drawstring, zip down the front, welt side pockets and one inner pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Metal earrings with marbled plastic pendants trimmed with sparkly stones. Length approx. 11 cm.
Hi-tops with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the front, elasticated lacing, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Velour soft toy with embroidered appliqués and a removable mermaid costume. Polyester filling. Length approx. 30 cm.

Short, oversized dress in soft, stretch cotton denim with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back. Some of the cotton content of the dress is recycled.
Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Set with a long top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in soft jersey. Top with print motifs on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist and a print motif.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying jersey with a V-neck and a tie detail at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Set with a dress and pair of puff pants in patterned organic cotton. Dress with narrow shoulder straps and flare to the hem. Pants with elastication at the waist and hems.
Narrow, braided belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 1.5 cm.

Handbag accessory with a metal chain and carabiner hook and imitation leather pendant in the shape of a backpack. The backpack has a zip at the top, faux fur pompom and small, zipped outer compartment. Size approx. 3x7x9 cm.
Metal hair clips, two with a hammered finish.
Blouse in a cotton weave with inset lace trims, a small, frilled collar and buttons down the front. Yoke at the back and long puff sleeves with pleats and buttoned cuffs with a frill trim.

Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch and fake fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
T-shirt in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with pin-tucks that create a striped pattern.
Fully lined printed bikini. Triangle top with adjustable ties at the back of the neck, a plastic fastener at the back and sewn-on metal decoration on one shoulder strap.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Short, fitted dress in jersey with a V-neck, wrapover top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist and a skirt with gathered, vertical seams for a draped effect and a flounce at the hem. Lined bodice.
Scarf in a soft cashmere weave with fringes along the short sides.

Biker jacket in supple imitation suede with a diagonal zip down the front and stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zipped side pockets and long sleeves with a ribbed elastic panel underneath and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Shirt in checked cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sunglasses with transparent plastic frames, metal sidepieces and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen. High waist with wide smocking to create a fitted style at the top and wide style to the hem. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, 3/4-length sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Short, block-coloured T-shirt in cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
